name: Fullportsite
body:
I've copied the code from CodePen over to GitHub for all to view the source.

I got a lot of compliments on my original site, but I felt it wasn't helping people learn the system properly since it's supposed to be a good BootStrap3 teacher. This code is still a WIP, and I will mark it as finalized, when it isn't.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
